title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 29
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 29
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tom Orlik Chief Asia Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and Asian economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Time for U.S. value stocks to shine, Deutsche Bank says." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
